title: Just buff shen ASAP
body:
Bought my friend a skin for this trash reworked champion please buff him.

I understand you wanted this rework not to be op like the other reworks recently, but he has no place in this game. If he is going to have no ranged poke, then he needs some buffs in some ways.

replies.body: Jungle or support now is my feeling... I will miss the old Shen dearly :(
He should do well in the jungle
